query
Interface BinaryOperation

All Superinterfaces:
PathExpression
All Known Subinterfaces:
Composition, Pairing
All Known Implementing Classes:
CompositionImpl, PairingImpl
public interface BinaryOperation
extends PathExpression

BinaryOperation is an operator from part of an PathExpression that gather 2 others PathExpression.
The BinaryOperation is directed, so its composed of a left and a right operand.

Author:
Julien.C
